thread.title: Happy Birthday to GamingOnLinux - 15 years old today
thread.title_full: Happy Birthday to GamingOnLinux - 15 years old today

author: Liam Dawe
title: Happy Birthday to GamingOnLinux - 15 years old today
text: Are those some spots I see in the mirror? Must be the teens. GamingOnLinux, the website, is another year older today and I'm still blown away by what we've achieved together. 15 years! I can hardly believe it. This year, amazingly, I don't have a whole lot to talk about for this article. Why? Well, things are — great? Looking back over the years of website birthdays at things I've talked about we've been through the Steam Machines, Proton, Steam Deck and so much more. Right now, it's the best Linux gaming has ever been. It's easier than ever. What a fantastic place to be in. Special thanks to our furious Discord moderator and supporter dpanter for sending over a cake: If you wish to support the continued news on GamingOnLinux the best way is [via Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/liamdawe). All other donations, without any special rewards can be done by: [Paypal Donation](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=P85ZZX9W8HFMW)or Monthly donation/sub: [Supporter](https://www.paypal.com/webapps/billing/plans/subscribe?plan_id=P-6MU983833N166101WL3ZRB5I)- [Supporter Plus](https://www.paypal.com/webapps/billing/plans/subscribe?plan_id=P-54T30471MU837021GL3ZRCMY) - Become a [YouTube Member](https://www.youtube.com/gamingonlinux). You can also buy games using GamingOnLinux affiliate / partner links: You can find all the links to support GamingOnLinux on [this dedicated page](https://www.gamingonlinux.com/support-us/) any time. As a little reminder you can easily use the [RSS Feed](https://www.gamingonlinux.com/rss/) to keep up to date. All article tags (at the bottom of articles) also have an RSS feed so you can follow exactly what you want. You can even build your own feed of a few tags together. And now a big big thank you to all of you. Every single one of you reading this. All of you who share links to GamingOnLinux, all of you beautiful supporters and helpers and just — everyone who comes along in some way. Without the community we would be nothing. Thanks again for being here and I hope you stick around for a very long time to continue this journey. A smol thanks for all the hard work, Liam. Enjoy! [Who?](/index.php?module=who_likes&comment_id=265914) Lovely choice of cakes, dpanter!
